body:
Comment 1: 
thank you.

please follow instructions given by golang.org/doc/contribute.html
to send the CL to golang-dev mailing list.

Alternatively, as this is a small change, if you don't want the trouble
(or don't expect to contribute to Go in the near future), I can mail it
for you.

just let me know what do you want.
_Labels changed: added **priority-soon**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
